name: Claap
description: Claap is an AI-powered asynchronous video platform that helps teams replace meetings with quick screen recordings, intelligent summaries, and collaborative tools for efficient communication.
longDescription: Claap is a modern video workspace designed to streamline team communication by enabling asynchronous video updates, screen recordings, and AI-driven insights. Its mission is to reduce the time spent in unnecessary meetings, allowing teams to work more flexibly and productively across time zones. The platform solves problems like meeting fatigue and information overload by providing tools for quick video sharing, automatic transcriptions, and summarized recaps that keep everyone aligned without synchronous interactions. Users can record videos directly from their browser, add comments, and integrate with tools like Slack or Notion for seamless workflows. Overall, Claap serves remote and hybrid teams in tech, marketing, and product development by fostering better collaboration and faster decision-making.
features: Quick screen recording allows users to capture and share videos in seconds, eliminating the need for scheduling meetings and enabling async updates.
AI-powered summaries automatically generate concise recaps of video content, helping viewers quickly grasp key points without watching the full recording.
Automatic transcription converts spoken words in videos to searchable text, improving accessibility and making it easy to reference discussions.
Collaborative commenting enables team members to add feedback, questions, or reactions directly on videos, fostering interactive discussions.
Integration with tools like Slack, Notion, and Google Workspace streamlines workflows by embedding videos into existing productivity apps.
Customizable video libraries organize recordings into channels for easy access and knowledge sharing across teams.
Analytics dashboard provides insights into video engagement, such as view counts and watch time, to measure communication effectiveness.
Secure sharing options allow users to control access with passwords or team-specific links, ensuring data privacy.
Mobile app support lets users record and view videos on the go, enhancing flexibility for remote workers.
AI-generated action items extract tasks and follow-ups from videos, helping teams stay on top of responsibilities.
Template library offers pre-built video formats for common use cases like status updates or bug reports, saving time on creation.

faqs.question: What is Claap primarily used for?
faqs.answer: Claap is used for asynchronous video communication to replace live meetings with recorded updates. It helps teams share information efficiently through screen recordings and AI summaries.

faqs.question: Does Claap offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Claap has a free plan with core features like unlimited recordings and basic AI summaries. Upgrades are available for advanced analytics and integrations.

faqs.question: How does Claap's AI work?
faqs.answer: Claap's AI automatically transcribes videos, generates summaries, and identifies action items. This makes content more accessible and actionable without manual effort.

faqs.question: Can Claap integrate with other tools?
faqs.answer: Yes, Claap integrates with Slack, Notion, Google Workspace, and more. This allows seamless embedding of videos into your existing workflows.

faqs.question: Is Claap suitable for remote teams?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, Claap is designed for remote and hybrid teams. It supports async communication across time zones, reducing the need for real-time meetings.

faqs.question: How secure is Claap?
faqs.answer: Claap uses enterprise-grade security with encryption and access controls. Users can set passwords or limit sharing to specific teams.

faqs.question: What makes Claap different from Zoom?
faqs.answer: Unlike Zoom's focus on live meetings, Claap emphasizes asynchronous video recordings with AI enhancements. This saves time and allows flexible viewing.

faqs.question: Can I use Claap on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, Claap has a mobile app for iOS and Android. Users can record, view, and comment on videos from anywhere.

faqs.question: How does Claap help with productivity?
faqs.answer: Claap reduces meeting time by enabling quick video shares and AI summaries. Teams can focus on work instead of scheduling calls.

faqs.question: What industries benefit from Claap?
faqs.answer: Tech, marketing, product, and sales teams use Claap for updates and feedback. It's ideal for any collaborative environment seeking efficiency.
